user-info.Description: Here you are able to manage all your TMW Universe profile information.

user-info.Title: Personal information
user-info.Description: Check your personal information and modify it whenever you want to.

user-prefs.Title: User preferences
user-prefs.Description: Customize your experience so it adapts to you.

security.Title: Account security
security.Description: Keep your account safe so you are the only one capable of accessing to it.
